title: Piracy - actual and attempted attacks worldwide by country 2019
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of incidents in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
The highest Country Nigeria has 29.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Country Venezuela.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
The highest value at Country Nigeria is 5.83x times more than the lowest value at Venezuela.
Country Nigeria is higher than any other Countrys with value 35.0, followed by Indonesia, and Singapore Staits. Down to Country Venezuela with the lowest value 6.0.
Similar Number of incidents is found in Country Venezuela, and Cameroon.
The highest value 35.0 at Nigeria is almost 2.33 times larger than the average value 15.0.
The Number of incidents is 105.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
